column_description: Unique integer id of a lead record.
The timestamp each lead object was created at.
The timestamp each lead object was last updated at.
The email address of the lead.
The first name of the lead.
The last name of the lead.
Lead’s Phone Number.
Primary phone number of the lead’s company
Lead’s mobile phone number
Lead’s company name
Company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit
Second address associated with the lead.
Lead’s address.
Lead’s city
Lead’s state
Alpha-2 code of the Lead’s state
Lead’s country
Alpha-2 code of the Lead’s country
Lead’s postal code
Billing street address of the lead’s company
City of the lead’s billing address
State or province of the lead’s billing address
Alpha-2 code of the state or province of the lead’s billing address
Country of the lead’s billing address
Alpha-2 code of the country of the lead’s billing address
Postal code of the lead’s billing address
Lead’s city inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
Lead’s state region inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
Country inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit
Lead’s postal code inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
Lead’s phone area code inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
IP address of the lead’s first recorded web visit
Lead’s email-unsubscribed status (boolean). Partially system managed. Will prevent receipt of non-operational emails if set to true.
Email invalid status (boolean). All emails to the address will be blocked if set to true. Bounces indicating that the email is invalid will automatically set this field to true.
Lead’s do-not-call preference (boolean)
